This seems to be an abandoned building ...... always feels like something that should not appear in a modern school ......

No, it couldn't be… This voice maybe…
不对，这个地方的活人应该就只有刚才我遇到的那个学姐了……莫非这个声音是……
ううん、そんなはずない。雷電芽衣が異様なだけであって、私みたいな人間以外、生き残れるわけがないもん……。いや——そっか、まさか！
아냐, 그럴 리 없어. 라이덴메이가 이상할 뿐이고, 나 같은 인간 말고는 살아남을 수 없을 텐데...... 아니——그래, 설마!
No, it can't be. The only person other than me that should've been able to survive is Raiden Mei, and she's a special case. Could it be that this sound is...
Não, a única pessoa viva ao redor deveria ser a Senpai que acabei de conhecer mais cedo... Poderia este som ser...?
No, the only living person in this place should be the schoolmate I met just now ...... Could it be that this voice is ......
No, it can't be. It's just that Raiden Mei is just bizarre, and there's no way anyone but someone like me could survive. ...... No--I see, no way!
msg
Humph, I know you are checking the third "Houkai explosion"! Don't try to escape!
哼，你果然在暗中观察着这第三次崩坏！既然被我发现了，你可就别想跑了！
私の読み通り、あの人が第三次崩壊を調査しに来てるんだ！そうと分かれば追いかけないと！絶対、逃がさないんだからっ！
내 예상대로, 그 사람이 제3차붕괴를 조사하러 온 거야! 이제 알았으니 쫓아가지 않으면! 절대, 놓치지 않을 거야!

Hah! I knew it, you really are investigating this outbreak in secret! Now that I know you're here, you're not getting away! (TN: Weird that Kiana is calling it the Third Eruption in the original text, when at the moment she thinks this is simply a large Honkai outbreak)
Ha! Você realmente está indo atrás desta Terceira Erupção em segredo! Agora que eu descobri que você está aqui, você não vai escapar!
Hmph, you really are secretly watching this third collapse! Now that I've found out, you're not going to get away!
As I read it, that guy is here to investigate the tertiary collapse! If I know that, I have to go after him! I won't let him get away!

I didn't except there is such a ruin in this academy.
没想到在这座偌大的学园还有这样荒废的地方。
スミのスミまで綺麗な学園なんだと思ってたけど、こんな風に汚れた場所もあったんだ。
구석구석까지 깨끗한 학원인 줄 알았는데, 이런 더러운 곳도 있었구나.
I thought this huge academy was clean as a whistle, but to think that there's such a dilapidated place here.
Pensar que ainda existe um lugar tão deserto nesta enorme academia.
I never thought there would be such a deserted place in this huge school.
I thought the school was clean to a smudge, but there were dirty places like this.
msg
The smell here is so bad… Does this academy keep polluting here…
这里真是太臭了……这座学园该不会把所有的废水之类的都排到这里了吧？
それに何だろう、このニオイ……うぇえ、クサい……。まさか、学園の実験廃水や汚染水なんかを全てここに流してるんじゃ……？
게다가 뭐지, 이 냄새... 으엑, 역해... 설마, 학원의 실험 폐수나 오염수를 전부 여기로 흘려보내는 건 아니지...?
And what's with this smell... Blegh, it stinks... No way, is this where the academy dumps all the sewage and waste from its experiments...?
Está muito malcheiroso aqui... Espere, é aqui que a academia despeja todo o esgoto e o lixo?
This place really stinks ...... this school should not discharge all the waste water and so on to here, right?
And what's that smell ...... ugh, it stinks ....... Don't tell me they're dumping all the experimental wastewater and contaminated water from the academy here......?
msg
msg
I can't image such a gorgeous academy is polluting this city.
外表光鲜，是世界闻名的学园都市，没想到背后却在不断地污染这座城市。
世界的にも有名な学園都市が、こんな違法なことに手を染めてたなんてね……立派な外見とは裏腹に街を汚染してたってわけだ。
세계적으로 유명한 학원 도시가 이런 불법적인 일에 손을 대다니... 훌륭한 외모와는 달리 도시를 오염시키고 있었던 거네.
Who would have thought that the world-famous Academy City would be involved in such illegal activities... It has such a shiny and polished appearance, but behind that façade, it's polluting the city.
Esta Cidade Academia mundialmente famosa tem uma aparência tão glamorosa, mas sob esse véu, está poluindo a cidade por trás dela.
It is a world-renowned school city with a shiny exterior, but I didn't realize that behind the scenes, it is constantly polluting the city.
I can't believe that a world-famous school city was involved in such illegal activities. ...... So, despite its fine appearance, it was polluting the city.
msg
And there is a sign to stop people… If we didn't try to check that weird sound, we wouln't come in.
外面还用了警示牌不让人进来，若不是追踪那个机车的声音，我恐怕也是不会随便过来看的吧。
しかも、ご丁寧に人が入らないよう警告板まで出してるし。私だってエンジン音を追って来なきゃ、一生ここには来なかったろうな。
게다가, 친절하게도 사람이 들어오지 못하도록 경고판까지 내걸고 있잖아. 나라도 엔진 소리를 쫓아오지 않았으면 평생 여길 오지 않았을 거야.
What's more, they even have a warning sign to prevent people from entering. If I hadn't followed that engine sound, I probably would've never come here.
Eles colocaram uma placa de advertência para impedir a entrada de pessoas. Se eu não estivesse seguindo o som de uma motocicleta, nunca teria vindo aqui por conta própria.
Outside also used a warning sign to keep people out, if not to track the sound of that locomotive, I'm afraid I would not just come over to see it.
And they even politely put up a warning board to prevent people from entering. If I hadn't followed the sound of the engine, I would never have come here.
msg
Maybe no one else saw this before…
要不是今天我见到了这幅画面，怕是这个景象永远都不会有人看到也说不定。
崩壊が起こらなきゃ、この悪事が永遠に闇の中だった可能性もあるんだ。
붕괴가 일어나지 않았으면, 이 악행이 영원히 어둠 속에 묻혔을 가능성도 있었던 거야.
If this Honkai outbreak never occurred, this evil deed might have remained hidden forever.
Se eu não tivesse visto isto hoje com meus próprios olhos, temo que ninguém jamais teria notado.
If I hadn't seen this image today, I'm afraid that this sight would never have been seen by anyone.
If the collapse hadn't happened, it's possible that this evil would have remained in the dark forever.

Pretty on the outside, yet rotten on the inside... Is that what human nature is like? Is that what our world is like?

Is this what human beings are like, shiny on the outside, but rotten on the inside? Or is all the world like this?

I hate here, smell so bad… And here are so many zombies…

Ugh, what is this place?! It stinks, the roads are unpaved and hard to walk on, and what's more, there are zombies swarming around due to being attracted by the engine noise, and...! Show a little more care for a girl, would you!

Este lugar é realmente desconfortável. É malcheiroso e difícil de andar, além de que há tantos zumbis atraídos pelo som.  Elas não parecem incomodadas com tudo isso. Bem, eu sou apenas uma garota delicada, e tenho necessidades femininas, ok?
This place is really nasty, smelly and difficult to walk, there are so many dead people attracted by the sound, they do not care, but this lady is still a girl at least, okay!

Oh, God! What is this place? It stinks, the road is unpaved and hard to walk on, and on top of that, it's crawling with zombies attracted by the sound of the engine! You should work on your girl more!

When I find the guy who drove motorbike, if he is the person who dropped me, I will hit his face!
等找到了那个开机车的家伙，如果真的是那个把我丢下的家伙的话，看我不把他揍得脑袋开花！

If it's really him on that bike, I won't let him get away with this! I'm gonna SMASH HIS HEAD OPEN!
Quando eu encontrar o cara com a motocicleta... Se foi realmente o cara que me deixou aqui... eu vou dar uma surra nele!!
When we find the guy with the motorcycle, if it's really the guy who left me behind, I'll beat his brains out!

msg
And there is blood here… Car accident? It's not him. He is a member of Kaslana, he wouldn't make this kind of mistake…
这里还有血迹……机车也倒在了这里…莫非是翻车了？看来不会是他了。他好歹也是一个卡斯兰娜家的战士，怎么可能犯这种低级错误……
ここで横転したんだ。それに血痕がここから点々と続いてる。この血の渇き具合からして結構時間が経ってそう……さっきのエンジン音とは別のバイクみたい。
여기서 넘어졌어. 그리고 핏자국이 여기에서 점점 이어져 있네. 이 피의 마른 정도로 봐선 꽤 시간이 지난 것 같아... 아까 들렸던 엔진 소리와는 다른 바이크인 모양이야.

It's flipped over. And there are bloodstains everywhere. Judging by the blood, it seems like quite a while has passed since this accident happened... It seems like it's a different bike from the one making that engine sound.
Há manchas de sangue aqui... Será que a bicicleta caiu? Bem, não pode ser ele. Ele ainda é um guerreiro da família Kaslana, ele não cometeria um erro  de tão baixo nível.

There is still blood here ...... locomotive also fell down here...could it be a rollover? Looks like it won't be him. He is at least a Caslana family warrior, how could he make such a cheap mistake ......

It overturned here. And the blood trail goes on and on from here. From the thirst of this blood, it looks like it's been here for quite some time. ...... It looks like a different bike from the one that made that engine noise earlier.
msg
We can check after the blood.
顺着血液去看看吧。虽然还是没有那个家伙的线索，还是有点失望的。
よし、血痕を辿ってみよう！カスラナ一族のあの人が、こんなとこで横転するなんて考えられないけど、調べてみる価値はありそう。
좋아, 혈흔을 따라가 보자! 카스라나 일족의 그 사람이 이런 곳에서 쓰러질 리가 없지만, 조사해 볼 가치는 있을 것 같아.
Okay, I'll follow the blood trail! I can't imagine that someone from House Kaslana would get flipped over in a place like this, but it might be worth investigating.
Vamos seguir o rastro de sangue e investigar. Pena que ainda não há pistas sobre onde ele está. É decepcionante.
Follow the blood and check it out. Still no clue about the guy though, still a bit disappointed.
Okay, let's follow the blood trail! It's hard to imagine that that member of the Kasrana clan would roll over in a place like this, but it's worth looking into.
